snippet: The United Nations official overseeing the destruction of chemical arms said it was not yet safe to remove the remainder of materials.
abstract: Sigrid Kaag, United Nations official overseeing the destruction of Pres Bashar al-Asad's chemical weapons arsenal, says it is not yet safe to remove the remainder of the materials because roads to the location have not been secured by government forces.

byline.original: By SOMINI SENGUPTA and RICK GLADSTONE

lead_paragraph: The United Nations official overseeing the destruction of chemical arms said it was not yet safe to remove the remainder of materials.

headline.main: Ingredients of Nerve Agent Still in Syria, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Ingredients of Nerve Gas Still in Syria, Official Says

keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
keywords.name: organizations
